actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to apply the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act of 1977 to the International Olympic Committee.
short_title: International Olympic Committee Integrity Act of 1999

summary.text: International Olympic Committee Integrity Act of 1999 - Amends the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act of 1977 to redefine "foreign official" to include any member of, employee of, or any person acting in an official capacity for or on behalf of the International Olympic Committee (thus applying such Act to the Committee).

titles.title: International Olympic Committee Integrity Act of 1999
A bill to apply the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act of 1977 to the International Olympic Committee.
